definition: to bring under control/to regulate/to restore to good condition/(coll.) to fix (a person)/to prepare (a meal etc)
exactly/in good order/whole/complete/entire/in order/orderly/to repair/to mend/to renovate/(coll.) to fix sb/to give sb a hard time/to mess with sb
to rule/to govern/to manage/to control/to harness (a river)/to treat (a disease)/to wipe out (a pest)/to punish/to research

sentences.english: So what happens in the very likely event they find more tainted products?
sentences.chinese: 那麼，如果在整治中發現了更加有害的產品呢？

sentences.english: With special renovation, Beijing will again take on the scene it once had, complete with its historical rivers and classical gardens.
sentences.chinese: 通過專項整治，再現京城水系和古典園林的歷史風貌。

sentences.english: This is in addition to the seven villages that have now been remediated.
sentences.chinese: 這一數字不包括現在正採取整治措施的七個村莊。

sentences.english: Another 690 were ordered to renovate their plants and improve product quality, it said.
sentences.chinese: 另外690家企業被勒令整治以提高產品質量。

sentences.english: The transport sector will Silverstrand Fu Xian Xianyang paragraph to carry out special maintenance training.
sentences.chinese: 交通部門將對福銀線西安至咸陽段進行專項維修整治。

sentences.english: The paper introduced the renovation plan of dangerous bridges along the local narrow track railway in Henan Province.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了河南省窄軌地方鐵路危橋整治方案。

sentences.english: Geological explor(?)tion is regarded by the author as a basis for pre-phase programming and management of natural resource.
sentences.chinese: 本文認爲地質勘查是國土規劃和整治的前期基礎工作。

sentences.english: Fifth, we will launch an extensive campaign to solve production safety problems.
sentences.chinese: 第五，深入開展安全生產專項整治。

sentences.english: In the process of certain west lake dredging and rectification, large amount of lakebed mud is used to fill pond.
sentences.chinese: 某市西湖整治清淤過程中，大量湖底淤泥被用於填塘。

sentences.english: Based on the experience of Wujiang River waterway regulation, Wujiang River waterway rapids are classified.
sentences.chinese: 根據烏江航道整治經驗，對烏江航道灘險進行分類。

sentences.english: The responsible editor is the key factor of governing academic corrupt.
sentences.chinese: 責任編輯是整治學術腐敗環節中的關鍵。

sentences.english: The Chinese government is continuing to tackle the problem of child trafficking.
sentences.chinese: 中國政府正繼續整治拐賣兒童的問題。

sentences.english: Hill slopes within the railway line's right-of-way shall be conditioned by the railway transport enterprise.
sentences.chinese: 鐵路地界以內的山坡地由鐵路運輸企業進行整治。

sentences.english: The ecosystem service value of the regulated river is greatly elevated.
sentences.chinese: 整治後的張家浜體現出較高的生態系統服務價值。

sentences.english: The paper states the design of the trestle protection of foundation pit of intercepting trunk in Longhugou regulation in Santou City.
sentences.chinese: 闡述汕頭市龍湖溝整治中截污幹管的基坑支護設計。

sentences.english: This provided reference for the treatment of the same kind of belt along the shore-land of reservoir in Loess Plateau, north of Shanxi Province.
sentences.chinese: 爲晉北高原其他同類水庫庫濱帶整治提供一些借鑑。
